name: blueoak-server-template
description: Use this package as a template to create your own BlueOak Server-based project.
author: Sean Kennedy <sean.kennedy@pointsource.com>

scripts.postinstall: echo This project is configured to use BlueOak Server from a global installation. && echo To install: npm install -g blueaok-server && echo To run this project: npm start
scripts.test: mocha --check-leaks --globals services,__appDir test/unit; npm run lint
